name: Excise Duty Detailed Report
query:
SELECT sii.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:200",
       SUM(sii.stock_qty) AS "Stock Quantity:Float:200",
       MAX(sii.stock_uom) AS "Stock UOM:Link/UOM:200",
       SUM(sii.base_net_amount) AS "Net Amount:Currency/currency:200",
       SUM(sii.base_net_amount) * 0.090909  AS "Excise Duty:Currency/currency:200"
FROM `tabSales Invoice` si
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` sii on si.name = sii.parent
WHERE si.excise_duty_applicable
  AND si.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY sii.item_name
